review: Despite Amazon's failed attempts at ALL consumer electronics (I'm looking at you kindle HD fire and fire phone), they really hit a home run with this device. It is super fast with an easy to use layout. I got this after my Roku started having problems maintaining a connection to the stream. Once you switch from a Roku, you will be blown away at how fast and easy it is to use. It has excellent voice recognition integrated into the remote that makes searching effortless. More and more apps are available- I just downloaded HBO go (so my Roku is now officially a relic).One problem is that the down button on the remote has become much less responsive after 6 mos of use so I hope this doesn't need replacing.
